div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
شــهد الشّهود المسمون في هــذا الكتاب علــى إقــرار أنتــباس أننياس أنتباس أساس بن سسنّه
بن أنتباس أنتباس أننياس أساس السّاكن القرية المعــروفة بــنــواية من قرى أسفل أشمون أنّـه حضر
عندهم وأشهدهم على نــفسه في صحّة مــن عقله وبدنه وجواز أمره أن سلائح سلائح
أراضي الأملاك المعروفة بهورڤلپه والمپسوپه الى پڤإم بن بفام هلسبوس مما كان
باسم جرجه فرمان فرمان بدلالة نواية ممّا تقبّل به مزاحم بن إسحق بن محمّد بن أحمد عامل
أبي أحمد الحسن بن محمّد على إعمال الخراج والضياع بكور الأشمونين لأربع
سنين متواليات أوليهن سنة اثني عشر وثلثماية وآخــرتهن سنة خمس عشرة
وثلثماية بعشرين دينارا عيونا ذهبا مثاقيل معسولة بنقد بيــت المــال ووزنه
سوى ما يجب فيه من الأجرة والاسداا بحساب خمسة دنانيــر لكــلّ سنــة
إن ذلك ملكا له ولآباه قبلــه وإنّه قبالة مزاحــم بن إسحق وذلك إليه أن يسلّــم
إليه ذلك فسلّم مزاحم بن إسحــق إلى أننيــاس أنتباس أننياس أساس بــن سسنّه بن أنتباس أنتباس أننياس أساس النّوائي النوئى ذلك إليه
وأقر أننياس أنتباس أننياس أساس بن سسنّه بن أننياس أنتباس أننياس أساس الـنّوائي أنّه تسلّم من مزاحم بن إسحق سلائح سلائح
أراضي الأملاك المذكورة في هذا الكتاب وحازها لنفســه وزرعها وزرع من
أحب وأسجل من شا وألزم نفسه عمارة ذلك والــتمام بها پ
عــلــى الشّــرايــط الثّابتة في ديوان الخراج دون مزاحم بن إسحق ولـدفع أننياس أنتباس أننياس أساس بن سسنّه
بن أنتباس أنتباس أننياس أساس النّوائيّ جمــيع خراج ذلك عمّا يجب لحقّ بيت المال دون حقّ لما من
خــراج سلائح سلائح أراضي الأملاك المذكورة في هذا الكتاب
دون مزاحم بن إسحق لسنتين متــواليتين أوليهنّ سنة أربع عشرة وثلثماية وآخرتهنّ
سنة خمس عشرة وثــلــثمايــة عــلى الــشّرائط الثّابتة في ديوان الخراج بالمال
مزاحم بن إسحق بن إبرهيم في هذا الكتاب
درك الخراج أو موپه أو كلفة أو يــحتــج فيـه بحجّة من على الوجوه الوجوه ولا
والأسباب كلّها فعلى أننياس أنتباس أننياس أساس بن ســسنّه النوئي من خالص ماله
وأوفره وأحضره وأحضره وضمن له ذلك ضمــانا لازما له في ذمّته
شهــد على إقرار أنتناس أنتباس أننياس أساس بن سسنّه بن أننيــاس أنتباس أننياس أساس النوئي
من أوّله إلى آخره بعد أن قرئ عليه حرفــا حرفا فعرف ما فيه وأقرّ
بفهمه ومعــرفــتــه شهد علــى ذلك

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
šahida ăš šuhūdu ăl musammawna fī hāḏā ăl kitābi ʿalà ʾiqrāri ʾananiyāsa ʾantanāsa ʾantibāsa ʾasāsa bni sisinnaha
bni ʾananiyāsa ʾantanāsa ʾantibāsa ʾasāsa ăs sākini ăl qaryaẗa ăl maʿrūfaẗa bi nawāyaẗa min qurà ʾasfali ʾušmūna ʾanna hu ḥaḍara
ʿinda hum wa ʾašhada hum ʿalà nafsi hi fī ṣiḥḥaẗ:in min ʿaqli hi wa badani hi wa ǧawāzi ʾamri hi ʾanna salāʾiḥa salāʾiḫa
ʾarāḍī ăl ʾamlāki ăl maʿrūfaẗi bi hūr qultaha wa ăl mansūbaẗi ʾilà bifāma buqāma bni hilistūsa mimmā kāna
bi ĭsmi ǧirǧahi faramāna quzmāna bi dilālaẗi nawāyaẗa min mā taqabbala bi hi muzāḥimu bnu ʾisḥāqa bni muḥammadi bni ʾaḥmada ʿāmilu
ʾabī ʾaḥmada ăl ḥasani bni muḥammad:in ʿalà ʾaʿmāli ăl ḫarāǧi wa ăḍ ḍiyāʿi bi kuwari ăl ʾušmūnayni li ʾarbaʿi
sinīna mutawāliyāt:in ʾūlà hunna sanaẗu ĭṯnay ʿašara wa ṯalāṯi miʾaẗ:in wa ʾāḫiraẗu hunna sanaẗu ḫamsa ʿašraẗa
wa ṯalāṯi miʾaẗ:in bi ʿišrīna dīnār:an ʿuyūn:an ḏahab:an maṯāqīla maʿsūlaẗ:an bi naqdi bayti ăl māli wa wazni hi
siwà mā yaǧibu fī hi min ăl ʾuǧraẗi wa ăl ʾsdʾ bi ḥisābi ḫamsaẗi danānīra li kulli sanaẗ:in
ʾinna ḏālika milk:an la hu wa li ʾābāʾi hi qabla hu wa ʾinna hu qabālaẗu muzāḥima bni ʾisḥāqa wa ḏālika ʾilay hi ʾan yusallima
ʾilay hi ḏālika fa sallama muzāḥimu bnu ʾisḥāqa ʾilà ʾananiyāsa ʾantanāsa ʾantibāsa ʾasāsa bni sisinnaha bni ʾananiyāsa ʾantanāsa ʾantibāsa ʾasāsa ăn nawāʾiyyi ḏālika ʾilay hi
wa ʾaqarra ʾananiyāsu ʾantanāsu ʾantibāsu ʾasāsu bnu sisinnaha bni ʾananiyāsa ʾantanāsa ʾantibāsa ʾasāsa ăn nawāʾiyyu ʾanna hu tasallama min muzāḥima bni ʾisḥāqa salāʾiḥa salāʾiḫa
ʾarāḍī ăl ʾamlāki ăl maḏkūraẗa fī hāḏā ăl kitābi wa ḥāza hā li nafsi hi wa zaraʿa hā wa zaraʿa man
ʾaḥabba wa ʾasǧala man šāʾa wa ʾalzama nafsa hu ʿimāraẗa ḏālika wa ăt tamāma bi hā *** B
ʿalà ăš šarāyiṭi ăṯ ṯābitaẗi fī dīwāni ăl ḫarāǧi dūna muzāḥima bni ʾisḥāqa wa la dafaʿa ʾananiyāsu ʾantanāsu ʾantibāsu ʾasāsu bnu sisinnaha
bni ʾananiyāsa ʾantanāsa ʾantibāsa ʾasāsa ăn nawāʾiyyu ǧamīʿa ḫarāǧi ḏālika ʿammā yaǧibu li ḥaqqi bayti ăl māli dūna ḥaqq:in li māʾ:in min
ḫarāǧi salāʾiḥi salāʾiḫi ʾarāḍī ăl ʾamlāki ăl maḏkūraẗi fī hāḏā ăl kitābi ***
dūna muzāḥima bni ʾisḥāqa li sanaẗayni mutawāliyatayni ʾūlà hunna sanaẗu ʾarbaʿa ʿašraẗa wa ṯalāṯi miʾaẗ:in wa ʾāḫiraẗu hunna
sanaẗu ḫamsa ʿašraẗa wa ṯalāṯi miʾaẗ:in ʿalà ăš šarāʾiṭi ăṯ ṯābitaẗi fī dīwāni ăl ḫarāǧi bi ăl māli ***
muzāḥim bn ʾisḥāqa bni ʾibrāhīma fī hāḏā *** ø ăl kitābi *** ʿalà *** ʾan *** yuʾaddiya *** mā
daraki ăl ḫarāǧi ʾaw muʾnaẗ:in ʾaw kulfaẗ:in ʾaw yaḥtaǧǧu fī hi bi ḥuǧǧaẗ:in *** mina ʿalà ăl ø wuǧūhi ăl wa wuǧūhi lā *** sababa *** mina *** ăl ø ʾasbābi
wa ăl ʾasbābi kulli hā fa ʿalà ʾananiyāsa ʾantanāsa ʾantibāsa ʾasāsa bni sisinnaha *** ăn nawāʾiyyi ø min ḫāliṣi māli hi
wa ʾawfari hi ʾaḥḍari wa ʾaḫṣari hi wa ḍamina la hu ḏālika ḍamān:an lāzim:an la hu fī ḏimmaẗi hi ****
šahida ʿalà ʾiqrāri ʾananiyāsa ʾantanāsa ʾantibāsa ʾasāsa bni sisinnaha bni ʾananiyāsa ʾantanāsa ʾantibāsa ʾasāsa *** ø ăn nawāʾiyyi
min ʾawwali hi ʾilà ʾāḫiri hi baʿda ʾan quriʾa ʿalay hi ḥarf:an ḥarf:an fa ʿarafa mā fī hi wa ʾaqarra
bi fahmi hi wa maʿrifaẗi hi šahida ʿalà ḏālika ***

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful In the name of God the merciful and compassionate
The witnesses named in [th]is dee[d] have [te]stified t[o] the ack[no]wledg[ment] by A[nta]nâs b. Sisinna The witnesses named in [thi]s writi[ng] [wi]tness the acknowled[ge]me[nt] of A[nta]nās ibn Sisinah
b. Antanâs, residing in the village kno[wn as] Na[w]âye, one of the villages of Lower-Ašmûn, that he had come into their Ibn Antanās, residing in the village kno[wn as] Na[wā]yah, one of the villages of Lower Ushmūn, that he was present
presence and had called them to witness as to his [responsibility, he being in a state of sound] mind and body and capable of transacting his business; that the fallow with them and had called them to witness on his be[half] in the soundness o]f his mind and his body and the lawfullness his instruction. Verily, the fallow
fields of the properties known as Hūr Qultah, ascribed to Biqām ibn Halistūs, part of what had been lands of the landed propery known as Hôr Qolte and (originally) named in reference to Bqâm b. Helistûs, belonging to that which passed
in the name of Jirjah Quzmān in the auction of Nawāyah, part of what Muzāḥim ibn Isḥaq ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad the executive under the name of Ǧirǧe b. Quzmân at the auction of Nawâye, (and) which Muzâḥim b. Muḥammad b. Aḥmad, the finance-administrator
of Abû Aḥmad al-Ḥasan b. Muḥammad, entrusted with the administration of the taxes and domains in the disctric[ts] of al-Ušmûnain, had taken on lease for four of Abū Aḥmad al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad over the administration of the kharāj and the estates of the distric[t]s of al-Ushmūnayn leased for four
successive years reckoning from the year three hundred and twelve and en[d]ing with the year three hundred successive years the first of them being the year twelve and three hundred and the la[s]t of them being the year fifteen
and fifteen, for twenty dînârs, miṯqâlî gold-coins, correctly counted out according to the standard and weight of the Tre[asur]y and three hundred for twenty washed weight measures dinars coins of the cash of the trea[sur]y, in gold coins, and it was weighted out,
apart from what had been agreed upon as the rent and the [.........] reckoning at five dînâ[rs] ye[ar]ly, apart from what is imposed on it for rent and [...] And that is reckoning at five dina[r]s for each [yea]r.
seeing that this (was) his possession and that of his ancestors before him, [and that it is a tenancy of Muzâḥi]m b. Isḥâq, it really belonging to him, that he han[ded] Verily, that is property belonging to him and belonging to his father befo[re him. Verily its the tenancy of Muzāḥi]m ibn Isḥaq. And that is his to hand [over]
it over to him. Thus Muzâḥim b. Isḥâ[q] has handed this over to Antan[âs b.] Sisinna b. Antanâs, originating from Nawâye, to him. And Muzāḥim ibn Isḥa[q] handed that over to Antan[ā]s [ibn Sisinah
and Antanâs b. Sisinna b. Antanâs, originating from Nawâye, has acknowledged that he has taken over from Muzâḥim b. Isḥâq the fallow And Antanās [ibn] Sisinah ibn Antanās of Nawāyah affirmed that the fallow fields of the property mentioned in this writing
lands of the landed property mentioned in this deed, and he has taken it into [his] own possession [for cul]tivation, so that whoever desires may were handed over by Muzāḥim ibn Isḥaq. And he took possession of them for himse[lf to cu]ltivate it. And whomever
cultivate (it), and whoever wills may register (it), and he has bound himself to the amelioration thereof [and] to [carry through (all matters) concerned therewith ......] ... he likes can cultivate them. And whomever he wishes can register them. And he himself is responsible for the assessment of that, [and] the [whole of it
acco[rdi]ng to the con[di]tio[n]s [established] in the kharā[j] office un[der Muz]ā[ḥim ibn Isḥaq]. And [Antanās ibn Sisinah] accord[ing] to the con[di]tion[s established] in the ta[x]-office, in the presen[ce of Muz]âḥim b. Isḥâq]; and [Antanâs b. Sisinna]
b. [A]ntanâs, originating from Nawâ[ye], is to p[ay] the who[le of the land-tax thereof from what is obligatory as Treasury dues beyond the water cess of] ibn [A]ntanās of Naw[āyah] will de[liver all of the kharāj. That is for what is imposed for the right of the treasury, under the right for water, part of
the [kha]rāj of the irriga[ted] fall[ow] fields of the p[roper]ties [mentioned in this writing [the la]nd-tax of the [fa]llo[w] lands [mentioned in this deed .......... ]
in the presence of Muzâḥim b. Isḥâq, for two suc[cessive] years [reckoning from the year three hundred and fourteen and ending with] under Muzāḥim ibn Isḥaq for two su[ccessive years the first of them being the year fourteen and three hundred and the last of them
being the year fifteen and thre[e hun]dre[d, ac]cording to the stip[ulations established in the kharāj office for the pro[perty the year t[hr]ee hundred and fifteen [ac]cording to the [conditions established in the tax-office in the money ......... ]
Muzâḥim b. Isḥâq b. Ibrahîm in thi[s ......... ] Muzāḥim ibn Isḥaq ibn Ibrahīm in this [writing on condition that he fulfill what
claim of kharāj, or provision, or imposition, or a[rg]ue [about it on the basis of a document for any cause or reason cause] vindication of the land-tax or any burden or duty, or if any one [makes a cl]aim [against it ............... for whatever cause]
and all reasons. And Antanās ibn Si[sinah of Nawāyah] owes it [from his clear property or reason there may be, then (this falls) upon Antanâs b. Sis[inna ...... out of his own means]
be it abundant or straitened, and he guaran[teed all of that to him as a guarantee that he is responsible for out of his liability whether this be abundant or meagre and he guaranteed this to him as a gua[rantee binding upon him in respect to his obligation ......]
bore witness to the affirmation of Antanās ibn Sisinah ibn Antan[ās of Nawāyah [The following witnesses have testifie]d to the acknowledgment by Antanâs b. Sisinna b. Antan[âs ..........]
from its beginning to its end, after it had been read to them wor[d] by wo[rd so that he has comprehended what (is contained) therein and has acknowledged] from the beginning to the end after it was read to him le[tte]r by letter [and what is in it was explained to him. And it was read
that he has under[st]ood and comprehended it. There have testified to it: to his under[st]anding and its fairness he bore witness to that [
